scripts.deploy: ssh -t root@slideo.co.il docker exec -ti slideo_flask bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull;'; docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull; yarn build; php bin/console d:m:m -n; bash docker/restart.sh;'
scripts.deploy:symfony: ssh -t root@slideo.co.il docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull; yarn build; php bin/console d:m:m -n; bash docker/restart.sh;'
scripts.deploy:flask: ssh -t root@slideo.co.il docker exec -ti slideo_flask bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull;';
scripts.download:retry: ssh -t root@slideo.co.il docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'php bin/console slideo:download:retry;'
scripts.clear:downloads: ssh -t root@slideo.co.il docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'php bin/console slideo:clear:downloads;'
scripts.queue:start: ssh -t root@slideo.co.il docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'php bin/console messenger:stop-workers; php bin/console messenger:consume mail download -vv'
scripts.test:deploy: ssh -t root@51.15.202.136 docker exec -ti slideo_flask bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull;'; docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull; yarn build; php bin/console d:m:m -n; bash docker/restart.sh;'
scripts.test:deploy:symfony: ssh -t root@51.15.202.136 docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull; yarn build; php bin/console d:m:m -n; bash docker/restart.sh;'
scripts.test:deploy:flask: ssh -t root@51.15.202.136 docker exec -ti slideo_flask bash -c 'git reset --hard HEAD; git pull;';
scripts.test:download:retry: ssh -t root@51.15.202.136 docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'php bin/console slideo:download:retry;'
scripts.test:clear:downloads: ssh -t root@51.15.202.136 docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'php bin/console slideo:clear:downloads;'
scripts.test:queue:start: ssh -t root@51.15.202.136 docker exec -ti slideo_symfony bash -c 'php bin/console messenger:stop-workers; php bin/console messenger:consume mail download -vv'
